article: charleston , w. va. -lcb- ndash -rcb- thousands of mourners gathered on friday to commemorate robert c. byrd , the iconic west virginia senator who was celebrated as a student of history , devoted lawmaker and erudite orator whose history - making decades in office would serve as an example for generations .
abstract: mourners remember robert byrd as senator and son of west virginia
